data.meta_description: Learn about Adam Kaufman on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that include Adam Kaufman including Is This a Joke?, Cinderella Pact and more.
data.text:
Mother's Day

Secrets are revealed when Gibbs' former mother-in-law becomes a key witness in a murder investigation.

Episode 1

Stabler's daughter is present at a disturbing crime scene. Meanwhile, the internal investigation into the psyches of the detectives produces interesting results.

Guilty Pleasure

The team turns to Holly Snow for help when a Navy officer's death is connected to a prostitute.

Doubt

McGarrett asks Catherine for help finding his mother, while the team seek assistance from August March with a dangerous art heist case.
